name: Sylvia Tate
testimony: Murderer and Victim ate lunch together.

name: Xavier Bustillos
testimony: Saw the Murderer calmly going about their routine after the crime.

name: Octavian Fuller
testimony: Murderer and Victim were playing poker last night at D'Place.

name: Richard Sleeper
testimony: Heard a scream, saw Murderer exiting the scene shortly after.

name: Mungo Adler
testimony: Victim gave Murderer an extra ration last week.

name: Uriah Jessup
testimony: Saw a child delivering the Murderer a note, face blanked upon reading.

name: Bianca Brett
testimony: Earlier that day, Victim and Murderer spoke in hushed tones about the unionization effort.

name: Deedee Knotts
testimony: The Murderer called in a favor on the Victim.

name: Elyse van Warwick
testimony: Murderer once tried to force the Saloon doors before opening hour.
